|chip1 = Intersil;ISL3874; |chip2 = Intersil;ISL3685; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This particular device (or hardware revision of this device, it's '''2.0''' on the back label) is a [[Z-Com XI-626]].
